CustomField.description: AJ TDF Enhance: Added details of related collect and deliver WOs. Used for non-mobile display.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Collect_From_Work_Order__c),'Deliver to ' & Deliver_To_Work_Order__r.Location.Name, IF(ISBLANK(Deliver_To_Work_Order__c),'Collect from ' & Collect_From_Work_Order__r.Location.Name, 'Collect from ' & Collect_From_Work_Order__r.Location.Name & ' & Deliver to ' & Deliver_To_Work_Order__r.Location.Name) ) & ': '& Product__r.Name & ' (' & TEXT(Requested_Quantity__c) & ')'
CustomField.label: Subject Detail
